titles.title: To provide that the exception from the limitation on the accumulation of annual leave which currently applies to Federal employees affected by the closure of a military installation be extended to those affected by a realignment with respect to any such installation as well.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

bill.summary: 1/25/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal civil service law to provide for the restoration of annual leave lost by employees affected by a military base realignment.
